messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Re:Samurai in Mummers' Parade
messages.msgSnippet: ... Yeah, guys, take it easy. It s just a parade. cepo [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
messages.messageBody:
On Jan 2, 2004, at 7:13 PM, Kitsuno wrote:

> --- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, "keiman0" <KeimanZero@h...>
> wrote:
> > KonnichiWa and Happy New Year Hazu-- We were quite surprised
> > yesterday to see that several of the groups in the parade in Philly
> > had Samurais as a theme. And in Times Square on NY Eve the
> > predominant sign was Tom Cruise in The Last Samurai. Just thought
> > you'd like to know that Samurais are popular today.-Keiman and Kei.
>
> ....much to the chagrin of many in the group here.

Yeah, guys, take it easy. It's just a parade.
cepo


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re:Samurai in Mummers' Parade
messages.msgSnippet: KonnichiWa and Happy New Year Hazu-- We were quite surprised yesterday to see that several of the groups in the parade in Philly had Samurais as a theme. And
messages.messageBody:
KonnichiWa and Happy New Year Hazu-- We were quite surprised
yesterday to see that several of the groups in the parade in Philly
had Samurais as a theme. And in Times Square on NY Eve the
predominant sign was Tom Cruise in The Last Samurai. Just thought
you'd like to know that Samurais are popular today.-Keiman and Kei.
